channel.title: Broken; A game about tragic romance
channel.description:
**https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MwQsCX1kg8XBC6zfMHG** ![Heartbreak|640x427](upload://pmsSqtHvU5l2taSAVyeQF8bTk4N.jpeg)
*Broken* is a tragic romance game for two players by Ben Wallis (thatgamerpriest).
We tell the story of a break-up. Together we will create the relationship and relationship dynamics between the two of us. We'll "enjoy the new relationship energy, but explore the red flags emerging even in those early encounters. And over the course of ten scenes, [we] will explore the ways in which the things you loved about each other slowly slip away and dissolve until everything about your relationship is broken."
In *Broken* the relationship will always end. But while the tragic conclusion is inevitable, there is potential for healing and self-discovery along the way.
**What We Need**
You will need to gather a few elements to play *Broken* .
● Ten breakable objects OR ten popsicle sticks ● 12 index cards ● Markers, pens, or pencils ● A recording device, like a memo recorder or smartphone ● A single candle and matches or lighter ● An X card
I am figuring out how to play this game over google Jamboard and Zoom (links sent a week before play). If you don't confirm over email, I'll reach out to people on the waitlist.
[The Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines & Veils and the X-Card for safety tools.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
